paragraph.text: Welcome to the 35<sup>th</sup> annual Sunbelt Cohutta
We invite you to join us at the Cohutta Springs Conference
Center, in Crandall, GA on Sunday, October 7, 2018 - the
first Sunday of the month. Packet pickup is from 10:30 am
to 11:45 am, with orientation at 11:45 am; the race starts
at 12:30 pm. The race features a Â½ mile swim, 18 mile bike,
